description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Perception Service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-35265) affecting various Windows versions:

1. Download and apply the relevant update package for your system version from the official update catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect, addressing the race condition vulnerability.

**Details**:
- This update resolves a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition, which could allow local actors to elevate privileges within the system.
- Ensure the system matches one of the specified build numbers before proceeding with the update installation.
- Backup any critical data prior to applying updates to prevent data loss in case of issues during installation.
